text: The 2020 FIFA Puskás Award was the twelfth FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on December 17, 2020, during the The Best FIFA Football Awards 2020 ceremony, which was held virtually, with the nominees being revealed by FIFA on November 25, 2020. Tottenham Hotspur player Son Heung-min, for his goal against Burnley.
